item.title: Circle Issues 100 Million USDC on the Ethereum Network
item.description: On August 12th, according to the monitoring of whale_alert, Circle minted 100 million USDC on the Ethereum network 8 minutes ago.

item.title: Trump Team Expands Fed Chair Candidate Pool
item.description: August 12th. As per foreign media reports, officials have stated that the Trump team is broadening the scope of candidates for the position of Federal Reserve Chair. Federal Reserve Governor Bowman and Fed Vice Chair Jefferson are among those being taken into consideration. The White House is anticipated to make the announcement regarding the Federal Reserve Chair nominee this autumn. (FX678)

item.title: Trump to Extend Tariff Deadline on China by 90 Days
item.description: On August 12th, as per CNBC, it is expected that Trump will postpone the deadline for imposing tariffs on China by 90 days.

item.title: Trump: Will Not Impose Tariffs on Gold
item.description: On August 12th, following a U.S. federal ruling which led to chaos and turmoil in the global gold market, President Trump stated on Monday that he "will not impose tariffs on gold!". After Trump's announcement, gold futures on the New York Mercantile Exchange remained almost unchanged. Spot gold regained some of its lost ground, but still closed down by more than 1% on that day. As of Monday afternoon local time, no official new policy had been announced by U.S. institutions yet. (FXStreet)

item.title: In the last 24 hours, the entire network has seen a total of $439 million in liquidations, with both longs and shorts getting wiped out.
item.description: August 12th. According to data from Coinglass, within the past 24 hours, a total of $439 million was liquidated across the entire network. Globally, 124,354 people were liquidated. Among them, long positions were liquidated to the tune of $214 million, while short positions saw a liquidation of $225 million. The asset with the highest liquidation was BTC, with $124 million being liquidated, and ETH came in second with $91.0 million being liquidated.

item.title: Market News: Coinbase Ventures Acquires TON Tokens from Telegram
item.description: On August 12th, according to market information, an executive of the TON Foundation disclosed that Coinbase Ventures purchased TON tokens directly from Telegram.BlockBeats alerts users: At present, this news has not been officially confirmed by Coinbase Ventures and is for reference only.

item.title: CBOE Submits Application for Canary's Staking INJ ETF
item.description: On August 12th, CBOE submitted an application to the US SEC regarding Canary Capital's INJ ETF.Previously reported by BlockBeats on July 17th, Canary submitted the S1 application for the STAKED INJ ETF.

item.title: Ethereum Surpasses $4350, Continuing to Hit New Highs in This Bull Market
item.description: On August 12th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum surpassed $4350 and reached a high of $4366, establishing a new high in this round of the bull market, with a 24-hour increase of 2.76%.

item.title: Due to favorable news related to fee switch, UNI experienced a brief surge of over 8%.
item.description: On August 12th, according to HTX market data, due to the influence of the positive news related to fee switching, UNI witnessed a rapid surge of over 8%. It is currently trading at $11.8.BlockBeats had previously reported that the Uniswap Foundation recently proposed to establish a new legal entity named "DUNI" for its governance organization within the "Decentralized Autonomous Non-Profit Association" (DUNA) legal framework in Wyoming. The Uniswap Foundation stated in the announcement that by adopting the DUNA framework, it will open the way for protocol fees. At this point, some of the liquidity provider fees will be transferred to the DAO treasury.

item.title: The Uniswap Foundation Introduces the "DUNA DAO" Structure to Pave the Way for Fee Switching
item.description: On August 12th, as per The Block, the Uniswap Foundation recently put forward a proposal to establish a new legal entity named "DUNI" for its governance organization within the decentralized non-corporation non-profit association (DUNA) legal framework in Wyoming.The foundation is in charge of supervising the world's largest decentralized cryptocurrency spot exchange. This new legal entity will offer a legal cover while maintaining the existing governance structure of the Uniswap DAO, enabling it to engage service providers, sign contracts, and fulfill regulatory and tax compliance obligations.If the proposal gets approved, the Uniswap DAO will become the largest decentralized organization to adopt this legal framework. According to the proposal terms, the entity will receive $16.5 million worth of UNI tokens to cover past tax obligations and set up a legal defense budget. Since Uniswap has never chosen to be taxed as a corporation, the foundation anticipates paying less than $10 m
